handoffs.directive: Merge 7 completed research worktree branches into master, then assess findings and determine next steps for P1 Trace Semantics IR investigation
Execute the two unblocked synthesis beads (athena-ywn: cross-framework trace synthesis, athena-tyt: comparative IR synthesis) to advance toward Step 5 (draft candidate IR schemas)
Continue the P1 Trace Semantics IR investigation: plan and implement Step 3b (requirements refinement with coverage matrix)
Plan and implement Step 5a: Draft candidate IR schemas for ATHENA Trace Semantics Engine
Design a prompt for Codex to implement Step 5b: LEL IR prototype on OpenMM traces
Close the 5 open threads from Step 5a using the validated LEL prototype as empirical evidence
Push trace semantics into Phase 2 prototyping: add by_id index, implement CausalOverlay, implement R14 confounder query
Step 9 — a GROMACS adapter for cross-framework generalization
VASP adapter first, then hidden confounder litmus test
continue researching open threads in trace-semantics
Use sub-agent teams to investigate the smaller open items in trace-semantics in parallel
Reorganize trace-semantics FINDINGS.md for better navigability without cutting or adding content
Plan an experiment to answer WDK#41: How do you collapse a multi-metric comparison into one reward number?
Plan Session 3 for adversarial reward aggregation — design hybrid candidate combining HTG gating + Fisher compounding
Plan Session 4: Hybrid fixture perturbation robustness testing for WDK#41
Plan athena-rfp: S5 ceiling analysis — operating regime bounds and architectural options for WDK#41
Plan athena-e2a: Session 5 hybrid stretch analyses (calibration + correlation) with post-ceiling log-scaled BF normalization
Write the architecture-ready AggregateScore recommendation (athena-6ax) that turns all Session 1-5 + 4.2/4.3 evidence into one stable architecture contract

Build athena-4xm (BF normalization seam) — first implementation session. Add configurable BF norm hook to normalization.py with locked default bf_norm_log_scaled(bf, c=0.083647). Then proceed to athena-8b9, athena-fgo, athena-3lu.
Write acceptance test suite (athena-3lu) encoding margin parity, guardrail rejection, and decomposition invariant as automated regression checks
Wire acceptance_test.py and monitoring_hooks.py into a CI/pre-merge gate so the locked AggregateScore contract is continuously enforced on every change
